response.original_title: TO THE RIGHT AND THE REVERSE
response.overview: Something is happening with Ella, for a few weeks she no longer wants to go to school, her face no longer transmits its usual shine, her smile was pierced by the constant bath of her tears; her mother in her instinct can guess what happens to her; But who was he, who marked the destiny of that woman backwards and forwards?
response.title: TO THE RIGHT AND THE REVERSE
